com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class RokonAudio

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.RokonAudio

public class RokonAudio
extends java.lang.Object

This is optimized for short sound files, which must be played quickly such as sound effects in games. This is not suitable for music, and a relatively low file size limit exists. The RokonAudio class uses SoundPool to manage its sounds.

Author:
Richard
